job description:
Responsible for leading teams & working individually to solve complex problems using machine learning, text analytics, data mining and computer vision techniques, which may include sentiment analysis of products using social media data, machine application profiling using video data, & prediction of machine failure using machine data focusing on Supply Chain Performance.

Requires MS in Computer Science, Statistics, Applied Mathematics, or Engineering & 2 years experience applying predictive analytics to structured, semi-structured & unstructured data to solve complex business problems, including: (i) clustering and classifying data using text mining; and (ii) analysis of time series data using supervised and unsupervised machine learning to understand pattern to gain insight and to make data-driven decisions.

Alternatively, would accept BS in Computer Science, Statistics, Applied Mathematics, or Engineering with 5 years experience applying predictive analytics to structured, semi-structured & unstructured data to solve complex business problems, including: (i) clustering and classifying data using text mining; and (ii) analysis of time series data using supervised and unsupervised machine learning to understand pattern to gain insight and to make data-driven decisions. With either combination of education & experience, must have 2 yrs (concurrent) computer and database programming exp. with C , SQL, or Java or equivalent
